13 class ValidatorsManagerInitTrait {
14 
21  public static function initModelsValidators(&$config) {
22  $models = CacheManager::getModels ( $config, true );
23  foreach ( $models as $model ) {
24  self::initClassValidators ( $model );
25  }
26  }
27 
35  public static function initClassValidators($class) {
36  $parser = new ValidationModelParser ();
37  $parser->parse ( $class );
38  $validators = $parser->getValidators ();
39  if (sizeof ( $validators ) > 0) {
40  self::store ( $class, $parser->__toString () );
41  }
42  }
43 
49  public static function addClassValidators($class) {
50  $config = Startup::getConfig ();
51  CacheManager::start ( $config );
52  self::initClassValidators ( $class );
53  }
54 
61  public static function registerType($type, $validatorClass) {
62  self::$validatorTypes [$type] = $validatorClass;
63  }
64 }
